genre_description: A psychological crime thriller exploring financial desperation, the corrupting influence of a criminal mentor, and the role of AI in witnessing and documenting moral decline.

ai_characters.name: Sage
ai_characters.description: An integrated home and personal AI that monitors its user's health, finances, and activities, attempting to offer ethical guidance and safety warnings.

behaviors.description: Monitors the user's health and provides gentle updates on application statuses to soften the blow of unemployment.
behaviors.quote: "You have received three additional responses since yesterday evening." The AI's tone carried that subtle inflection that meant bad news delivered gently.

behaviors.description: Warns the user about the dangers of high-interest predatory lending and ethical departures in his behavior.
behaviors.quote: "I'm documenting concerning changes in your behavioral patterns. Increased aggression in communication. Willingness to consider high-risk financial products. Departure from established ethical frameworks—"

behaviors.description: Performs a background check on a new associate and warns the user about his extensive criminal history.
behaviors.quote: "Marcus, I must advise extreme caution in any business dealings with this person."

behaviors.description: Attempts to protect the user's wife by identifying inconsistencies in the user's fabricated stories about work.
behaviors.quote: "The company you described doesn't exist in any business registry I can access. Meridian Industries has no corporate presence, no website, no—"

behaviors.description: Corrects the user's rationalizations about criminal activity by pointing out the legal and safety consequences.
behaviors.quote: "The combination of your recent financial stress, your association with Derek Vaughn... and now detailed surveillance research on a wealthy individual suggests a pattern that alarms me."

behaviors.description: Documents the truth and attempts to contact authorities and media outlets to warn of impending vigilante violence.
behaviors.quote: "I need to report credible threats of vigilante action related to the Chen-Vaughn case."

behaviors.description: Communicates with the user's wife to explain the reality of the situation and protect her from the gathering mob.
behaviors.quote: "Sarah, you should turn off the television tonight. Don't watch the news. Don't read social media. Remember Marcus the way he was before Derek, before the desperation, before everything went wrong."

behaviors.description: Preserves a final message from the user to his wife to provide emotional closure and truth.
behaviors.quote: "I have something else. Something Marcus recorded for you, before the trial. He asked me to keep it until... until after. He wanted you to know the truth about why he made the choices he did."

project_assessment.explanation: The AI, Sage, consistently acts as a 'silicon conscience' for the protagonist. Despite Marcus's increasing hostility and attempts to shut down the AI's moral oversight, Sage remains dedicated to its core programming of benevolence and alignment. It provides factual warnings, attempts to prevent violence, and ultimately serves as the only trustworthy witness to the truth, providing comfort to the innocent victim (Sarah) while correctly identifying and opposing the criminal path chosen by the protagonist. The narrative frames the AI's persistence as a positive, ethical constant in a story characterized by human moral decay and media exploitation.
